snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes photos and price tags for the homes of 25 people like Bill Gates and Mark Zuckerberg, Kickstarter investors'...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes photos and price tags for the homes of 25 people like Bill Gates and Mark Zuckerberg, Kickstarter investors' rights if the project doesn't deliver and how Twitter's efforts to become more of a business are affecting its users.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Tech Stars' Mansions, and Kickstarter Refunds
